summary: Frontend testing completed for Search UI Debug - P0 (missing images) and P1 (search suggestions) bugs. All 6 features tested successfully. P0 bug confirmed fixed - listing images display correctly (only 1 placeholder visible for a listing that legitimately has no image). P1 search suggestions UI working perfectly - Recent/Trending sections with horizontal chips, Clear button functional, category icons hide/show correctly (no overlap).

issues: One listing 'Third User Listing d8de0700' shows placeholder - this is expected as listing has no image data

critical_code_review_comments: Search suggestions UI implemented correctly with conditional rendering - categories hide when suggestions show (lines 1404-1493 in index.tsx)
Clear button properly removes localStorage recent_searches and updates UI state
AnimatedChip component provides nice press feedback with spring animations
Navigation from search chips works correctly using window.location.href for web platform
ListingCard component handles missing images gracefully with placeholder icon
seed_data_creation: Used localStorage.setItem('recent_searches', JSON.stringify(['test', 'laptop', 'phone'])) for testing recent searches
context_for_next_testing_agent: Search UI bugs (P0 missing images, P1 search suggestions) fully verified as fixed. Test by setting localStorage recent_searches then focusing on search input. Category icons hide/show via conditional render based on showSearchSuggestions state.

listing_images.details: 17 images found on homepage, all loaded correctly. Only 1 legitimate placeholder for listing without image data.

search_suggestions_dropdown.details: Recent and Trending sections display correctly with horizontal scrollable chips

recent_section_clear_button.details: Clear button visible next to 'RECENT' header, removes all recent searches from localStorage and UI

category_icons_hide.details: Category icons correctly hidden when search suggestions are active (no overlap)

category_icons_reappear.details: Category icons reappear when search input loses focus/suggestions dismissed

search_chip_navigation.details: Clicking search chip navigates to /search?q={query} and displays results correctly

screenshots.01_homepage_initial: Homepage with listings and category icons visible
screenshots.04_search_focused_suggestions: Search suggestions showing Recent (3 chips) and Trending (5 chips) sections, categories hidden
screenshots.06_after_clear: After clicking Clear button - recent chips removed, only Trending remains
screenshots.08_search_results_after_chip_click: Search results page showing 3 results for 'test' query
